summary: This document is an alert report from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Edward Epstein, highlighting his status as a registered sex offender and detailing various legal issues and convictions related to sexual offenses and fraud. It includes multiple references to Epstein's criminal history and ongoing legal matters. This document contains a series of alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting various media articles related to his legal issues and allegations of sexual misconduct. The alerts indicate a critical risk priority for Epstein, with multiple mentions of lawsuits and media coverage surrounding his activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a financier and a registered sex offender, with a history of soliciting underage girls for prostitution and multiple legal issues.

events.title: Conviction for Soliciting Minors
events.description: Epstein pleaded guilty to soliciting minors for prostitution and served 13 months in jail.

events.title: Served Jail Time
events.description: Epstein served 12 months for a state charge of prostitution solicitation and registered as a sex offender.

events.title: Out-of-Court Settlements
events.description: As of May 2013, Epstein had made 17 out-of-court settlements related to sexual assault claims.

events.title: Initial Complaint
events.description: A woman contacted Palm Beach police regarding Epstein sexually assaulting her 14-year-old daughter.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is a registered sex offender since 2008.
He was convicted in 2008 for soliciting an underage girl for prostitution.
By 2011, 40 underage girls had come forward with similar allegations against him.
Epstein has made 17 out-of-court settlements related to sexual assault claims as of May 2013.
He served 12 months for a state charge of prostitution solicitation and registered as a sex offender.
Jeffrey Epstein is flagged in a critical alert by Deutsche Bank due to ongoing legal issues.
The document references multiple media articles discussing Epstein's connections to underage girls and various lawsuits against him.
Epstein's address is listed as being in the Virgin Islands.
The document includes alerts dated May 30, 2018, indicating ongoing monitoring of Epstein's activities.
There are numerous mentions of lawsuits and legal proceedings involving Epstein in various media outlets.
